content: आरोपः {@--1@} Attributing the nature or properties of one thing to another; वस्तुन्यवस्त्वारोपोऽध्यारोपः <ls>Vedānta S.</ls>; attributing or assigning to, imputation; दोषारोपो गुणेष्वपि <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--2@} Considering as equal; identification (as in सारोपा लक्षणा). {@--3@} Superimposition. {@--4@} Imposing (as a burden), burdening or charging with. {@--5@} Placing in or upon. {@--6@} Relating to. {@--7@} Superior position.
